News.headline: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Forest Green Rovers
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Forest Green Rovers
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dagenham and Redbridge v Forest Green Rovers
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League home match against Forest Green Rovers tomorrow
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to bounce back following their second defeat on the bounce in last Saturday’s 1-0 away defeat to Gateshead FC to overtake opponents Forest Green Rovers.

Forest Green Rovers have won their last two games and currently sit in 2nd place on goal difference, two places and two points above the Daggers.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Gateshead 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 1-2 Maidstone
Daggers 2-1 Bromley
Daggers 1-2 Guiseley
Southport 1-4 Daggers
 
Forest Green Rovers
Forest Green 3-0 Macclesfield Town
Forest Green 4-3 Woking
Gateshead 3-1 Forest Green
Forest Green 2-0 Boreham Wood
Barrow 2-3 Forest Green

Team News
Corey Whitely is back from his three game suspension. Matt Robinson and Curtley Williams both played for 60 minutes in a behind closed doors friendly against Barnet on Tuesday and could be part of the squad. Luke Howell and Luke Pennell are both still missing.
 
Previous Meetings
The Daggers last met Forest Green Rovers back in October where the Daggers got a 1-1 draw at The New Lawn thanks to an equalising goal from Oliver Hawkins.

Fixtures
There are nine games taking place in the Vanarama National League this Saturday due to Lincoln City’s involvement in the Emirates FA Cup quarter final, and Macclesfield Town and Tranmere Rovers being involved in the Buildbase FA Trophy this weekend, all 3:00pm KO’s.

Woking v Boreham Wood
Wrexham v Gateshead
Solihull Moors v Braintree Town
Eastleigh v Barrow AFC
Southport v Torquay United
Bromley v North Ferriby United
Guiseley v Aldershot Town
Daggers v Forest Green Rovers
Sutton United v York City

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
